markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Compete Alone](/Rules.aspx?ID=1248)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 166</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
It’s customary that each participant must compete alone and may receive no help from outside sources. However, some duels pit pairs of combatants against one another (either all together or as tag teams).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Compete Alone
